summary: Wah and Kinki both working at a computer company. Both of them are not getting on very well initially, but friendship develops into romance when they get to know each other after a while.
cast: Andy Lau|Sammi Cheng|Fiona Leung|Raymond Ho-Yin Wong|Shiu Hung Hui|Florence Kwok|Suet Lam|Kenny Kung|Sylvia Lai|Gabriel Harrison|Andy Tse|May Fu|Englie Kwok|Vanessa Chu|Terence Lam|Sheron Cheung|Chi-Wang Wong|Ruby Wong|Yung Henry Yu
keywords: female to male footsie playing|footsie under the table|female to male foot in crotch
director: Directors: Johnnie To, Ka-Fai Wai (as Wai Ka Fai)
title: Goo nam gwa lui
